Plot: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.
Title: A Scanner Darkly
Actors: Rory Cochrane, Robert Downey Jr., Mitch Baker, Keanu Reeves
tomatoConsensus: A faithful adaptation of Philip K. Dick's novel, A Scanner Darkly takes the viewer on a visual and mind-blowing journey into the author's conception of a drug-addled and politically unstable world.
